titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to prohibit the buying and selling of social security account numbers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E860)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 5/5/1994--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to impose criminal penalties upon any person who buys or sells the social security account number of another without the owner's written consent.
